Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP33.utils.observable.Listened
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP33.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SCEventVisitor, java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientHandler
extends Listened
implements java.lang.Runnable, SCEventVisitor
Class that holds client's socket and all client's data
